aboutme: I am Computer Science Graduate(2016-2020 batch) from Malaviya National Institute of Technology(MNIT, Jaipur), India. Currently I am working as Full Stack Developer for Oracle Financial Services Software(OFSS), India.

I am a fast learner and do faster development. I have handled multiple tasks under pressure by help of my organized way of working. The good thing - which my team members always appreciate for :),  is my perfection in task finishing and development which is very less pron to errors. I have worked on many technologies including Microservices with SpringBoot, Flexible RESTful APIs, DevOps, Natural Language Processing, Deep Learning etc.
I belong to Jhunjhunu(Rajasthan) from where I completed my primary, secondary and senior secondary education.

workexp: Working on DevOps: Maintaining the job scheduling service provided to applications in different flavors on Docker and Kubernetes.

Stable Developmnet(Backend and Frontend): Dealing with job scheduling service for different applications at the same time, ensuring product's stability. Reduced tech-debt by resolving a high number of bugs and providing useful enhancements within existing service.

UI Developemnt: Designed a few rich User Interfaces using OJET and refined the existing UI's to more rich and user friendly. The major difficulty was to make these UI faster and robust, which I successfully accompolished in very less span of time.
NLP: Developed a user-friendly multi-label text classification web application using NLP concepts and Oracle JavaScript Extension Toolkit(OJET).
Worked on Image preprocessing and Computer Vision for Real time Person identification and action recognition.
Developed an Python GUI based attendence system by using conventional image processing methods for face detection and recognition.
Worked on different time series forecasting methods(ARIMA, SARIMA, Prophet etc.) for sales forecasting.
